mapper.select: SELECT m.no no, title,opendate, (SELECT NVL(AVG(score),0.0) score FROM reviews WHERE movie_no = 1) score, movie_rating movieRating, runtime, contents,t.src src,poster,m.regdate regdate FROM movies m, trailers t WHERE m.no = t.movie_no AND m.no =#{no}

select no,title,runtime,src,poster,movie_rating movieRating from movies where no in(select movie_no from bookmarks, (select no,member_no,title from c_lists) clist where bookmarks.member_no=clist.member_no and clist.no=#{no} and type='C')
SELECT no,title,opendate,climed FROM movies WHERE climed BETWEEN 1 AND 30 ORDER BY climed desc
SELECT no,title,opendate FROM movies WHERE no BETWEEN 31 AND 35
SELECT no,title,poster FROM movies WHERE no BETWEEN 1 AND 10
SELECT no,title,poster FROM movies WHERE no BETWEEN 11 AND 20
SELECT no,title,poster FROM movies WHERE no BETWEEN 21 AND 30
